cancel-txt.description: Text to the right of the search box

hide-cancel.description: Whether to hide the text on the right

disabled.description: Whether to disable the search box

maxlength.description: Native property, which sets the maximum length. -1 means unlimited
maxlength.description_zh: 原生属性，设置最大长度。-1 表示无限制

v-model.description: The content of the input box is bound in both directions

use-suffix-slot.description: Whether to use the slot on the right side of the input box (deprecated, will be removed in the next minor version, just use the slot)
use-suffix-slot.description_zh: 是否使用输入框右侧插槽（已废弃，将在下一个 minor 版本被移除，直接使用插槽即可）

focusWhenClear.description: Whether or not to focus the input box when the Clear button is clicked
focusWhenClear.description_zh: 是否在点击清除按钮时聚焦输入框

events.name: focus
events.description: Enter the box to focus on the event

events.name: blur
events.description: Listen for out-of-focus events in the input box

events.name: search
events.description: Listen to the input box to search for events

events.name: clear
events.description: Listen for the input box to clear button event
events.description_zh: 监听输入框清空按钮事件

events.name: cancel
events.description: Listen to the text click event on the right side of the input box
events.description_zh: 监听输入框右侧文本点击事件

events.name: change
events.description: Listens for events that change the content of the input box
events.description_zh: 监听输入框内容变化事件

slots.name: prefix
slots.description: Customize the content on the left side of the input box
slots.description_zh: 输入框左侧自定义内容

slots.name: suffix
slots.description: Customize the content on the right side of the input box
slots.description_zh: 输入框右侧自定义内容
